forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. West wind around 16 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 51. West southwest wind 7 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
A gentle embrace of sunshine blankets Downtown San Francisco this afternoon, casting a welcoming aura over the city’s vibrant streets. With temperatures hovering around 61 degrees, there's a steady fall to approximately 59 in the later hours, accompanied by a brisk west wind whispering at 16 mph, occasionally gusting to 23. The clarity of the day enhances the Golden Gate in the distance, wrapping it in a special glow, yet it hints at the ever-present marine layer that lingers near the coast, keeping its cool, misty embrace close to the water.

As night unfurls its gentle shadows, expect the sky to don a partly cloudy guise, with temperatures dipping to a comfortable 51. The winds will ease, transitioning to a softer west-southwest breeze, perfect for an evening stroll along the quieter city streets. There is a soothing charm to this weather, inviting you to dress in layers—a light jacket over a comfortable shirt will serve you well, especially as the sun surrenders to twilight. Perhaps venture to a modest café for a warm drink, or lose yourself in a book amidst the soft hum of conversation, embracing the city's cozy evening vibe. The forecast reveals a day full of gentle transitions, a peaceful pocket of urban life under California’s expansive sky.
